Hi all,

I wrote a short tutorial on how to use SharpNEAT 2 to create a 
Tic-Tac-Toe AI: http://www.nashcoding.com/?p=90

The tutorial covers the basics of setting up the experiment, running the 
EA, and handling file I/O. It's part 1 in a series of at least 3 
tutorials. The next tutorial will cover co-evolution and the third one 
will cover HyperNEAT, so hopefully the resulting NNs will get 
progressively stronger.

Thoughts, comments, or questions are always welcome.

Wesley
